Articles.Content:
Last week, i decided to give a aerodynamics mod a try, but not Far, it's too much.

Instead, i downloaded [Near][/http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86419], which is great,

But i've been having some lots of problems when returning the shuttle, Near doesn't seem to slow down it to a landing speed, it feels like there is almost no drag on the atmosphere...

Anyone knows how to solve this?

You'll need a config for KSO to work correctly with NEAR (config for FAR will do). Try to search in KSOS thread; but remember that basically all shuttle mods are made for stock soupodynamics and generally it's quite hard to teach them how to fly in FAR\NEAR.
Problem is KSO was not made with FAR/NEAR support in mind, and due to how it is constructed, support will be poor at best. Wings have to be made in a certain way for FAR/NEAR to work with them.

More specifically, the center of pressure is going to be in the wrong place relative to the center of mass. Depending on how it is set up, it will likely either be highly unstable or way too stable. It will certainly not have the flight characteristics that you expect.
